entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait here. The officer will be here shortly.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 Scanning... Warning! Hostile vessels incoming with weapon systems armed!
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 Scanning... No hostile enemies detected in the vicinity.
entries.complete: Great job! The officer is safe!
entries.failed_destroy: The officer was destroyed! Your mission is a failure!
entries.failed_protect: Sorry, pilot! You musta been too far away from it! Mission failure!
entries.found_loc: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Scanning... Rendezvous for Car'das Officer point found.>
entries.goodbye_1: Thanks, pilot! You're a great help to us!
entries.goodbye_2: Nice, pilot! Thanks for getting me home!
entries.hull_half: Ahh! My hull is falling apart! Get them off me!
entries.panic_1: They're coming right at us! My ship isn't cut out for this!
entries.panic_2: Here they come, pilot! Let's get them!
entries.quest_escort_d: Make sure that the Car'das officer makes it to the hyperspace jump point safely.
entries.quest_location_d: You've been ordered to escort a Car'das officer in the Ord Mantell system. Beware of pirates!
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Meet with the Car'das officer at this location.
entries.reason_1: I see you'll be helping me home. Good. Let's get going.
entries.reason_2: Here I am. Let's get out of here quickly.
entries.shields_depleted: My shields are out! Help me before I'm a goner!
entries.split_quest_alert: Serissu: <Great job! Now come on home, my friend.>
entries.thanks_1: That was close. Thanks for getting me out of that mess!
entries.thanks_2: Great job! Couldn't have done it better myself, that's for sure!
entries.title: Escort the Car'das officer
entries.title_d: Escort the Car'das officer to the Hyperspace jump point.
